attributes.action: Introduce stricter laws on our Media Reporting !
attributes.additional_details:
The current media organisations have too much power !
They ride roughshod over the law because they have hugely powerful owners with their own politic, economic and business agendas !
Their reporting is sensationalistic, dramatic, irresponsible with twisted words and in many instances out right lies !
attributes.background:
To introduce stricter laws and regulations on how our Media Reports the news !
ALL media forms short be un-biased !

rejection.details:
We think these petitions are similar:

Criminalise the publication of unfounded false statements by the media
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303050 

Ensure balance and fairness in political reporting
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300700 

Corrections and clarifications in UK media to be as prominent as original story
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300557
